topic: Impact of prompt shuffling on creative thinking
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts will not only generate new ideas but also reveal underlying cognitive patterns and biases. The next step is to actively shuffle my prompts and document the outcomes, noting any recurring themes or emotional responses. This process will help me refine my creative strategies and enhance self-awareness in my thinking style.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
